19 class LpcPhy {
20 public:
21  LpcPhy(Uart * uart, Pin * reset, Pin * ispreq){
22  this->uart = uart;
23  this->rst = reset;
24  this->ispreq = ispreq;
25  echo = 0;
26  ram_buffer = 0x40000200;
27  }
